title: Analysis of Mathematics Learning Methods for Adult Practitioners and Design of Customized Teaching Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Emphasis on immediately applicable mathematical problem-solving competencies, with significant differences in learners' prior experiences

learning_goals: Learners can explain procedural solutions to basic statistical problems encountered in workplace settings
Learners can identify at least three of their own mathematics learning patterns using learning analytics tools
Learners can select at least two learning strategies based on behaviorist/constructivist theories appropriate to specific contexts

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
